bank_name.description: The name of the bank that account is located at

bank_routing_number.description: The 9 digit routing number for your bank. (Federal ABA Number) Provide a routing number for Automated Clearing House (ARCH) or electronic funds transfers instead of wire transfers. Please contact your bank for assistance.

bank_account_number.description: The account number for you Bank. Your account must be enabled to received deposits through the Automated Clearing House (ARCH), please contact your bank for asssistance.

bank_account_holder_name.description: Bank account holder name. Please match what your bank has on file using ISO basic Latin characters
